details: Pursuing double degrees in Business (Business Analytics) and Engineering (Computer Science) from August 2021 to May 2025
Strong academic track record with a CGPA of 3.95 in Business Analytics and 3.84 in Computer Science
Developed analytical and programming skills through courses in Python, SQL, Data Structures, and Algorithmic Thinking
Participated in data-driven projects and research initiatives, demonstrating proficiency in data analysis and visualization
Completed a Student Exchange Programme from January 2024 to July 2024

projects.project_title: MSC Maritime Case Summit 2023 - Optimizing Data Pipelines for Sustainable Maritime Operations
details: Designed and implemented a gamified approach to seafaring data processing using Talend, leveraging ETL workflows to enhance data quality and streamline data pipelines
Developed an innovative wearable device for open reporting, utilizing Apache Spark and Python to automate data management and troubleshoot performance issues
Engineered an AR-based training program for seafarer upskilling, applying machine learning algorithms and data visualization techniques to optimize training outcomes

projects.project_title: BHP, MSC Maritime Case Summit 2022 - Decarbonization Technologies for Sustainable Maritime Futures
details: Conducted comprehensive analysis of leading decarbonization technologies and alternative fuels, applying data-driven insights to inform strategic decisions
Designed and engineered an electric-powered engine for maritime vessels, utilizing SQL and NoSQL database technologies to optimize design and retrofit plans
Developed a long-term project plan with a 30-year forecast, leveraging data visualization and market trend analysis to assess financial viability and evaluate implementation strategies
Designed and implemented data pipelines using Talend, Apache Spark, and Python to process and analyze data from various sources
Collaborated with stakeholders to understand data requirements and ensured data quality, contributing to increased business intelligence
Utilized SQL and database technologies to troubleshoot performance issues and optimize data infrastructure for improved efficiency
Secured more than SGD 20,000 in cash and product sponsorships from various companies
Collaborated with stakeholders to ensure seamless execution of responsibilities, demonstrating project management and teamwork skills
Effectively negotiated and managed sponsorship deals, developing strong communication and negotiation skills

details: Developed and implemented a 3-day program schedule, leveraging project management skills to ensure smooth execution
